title: Should i buy 'Asus 15 Oled' from a seller named 'SMEZON' on Amazon?
selftext:
I have provided ratings and reviews for the said seller. 

Also if fellow redditors could recommend a Laptop with better specs that fit in my budget of 47k. I would highly appreciate it.
comments:
You can get this laptop  ASUS Vivobook 14 OLED,12th Gen Intel Core i3-1215U, 14"(35.56 cm) 2.8K 16:10 90Hz,Laptop [https://smpx.to/meMMxm](https://smpx.to/meMMxm)   
This one is from  [Appario Retail Private Ltd](https://www.amazon.in/sp?marketplaceID=A21TJRUUN4KGV&seller=A14CZOWI0VEHLG&isAmazonFulfilled=1&ref_=dp_merchant_link&asin=B0BHHBHZDG)  Amazon Official store for  ₹51,990 + Extra Bank offers.
No, Buy from a store. They offer competitive rates plus waay waay better service
Actually display is an issue here. Also this is way out of my budget. But thank you for the recommendation.

Actually this store is not ready to budge from 48k (without any accessories and NO bag) whereas on amazon it's selling @46k. 
Also isn't it that the after sales services would be provided by the service centres rather than the store?
This one OLED display & just over 50k with bank offers & all you can get this one under 50k which is great
